wikipedia_page.main: Derek James Neville Johnson (5 January 1933 – 30 August 2004) was a British track and field athlete.

response: 1958 was Hewson's best season, in addition to winning gold medal in the European Games, he also produced his best times over the half and the mile and their metric equivalent times, which when added to his record performances of previous years made him the fastest-ever Englishman over 880 yards, running a personal best in 1958 of 1:47.0, 1000 metres, 1000 yards and 1500 metres running a personal best in 3:41.1, whilst only Derek Johnson had run faster over 800 metres and Roger Bannister and Derek Ibbotson had run faster over the mile.
*Derek Johnson, 71, British athlete and athletics administrator.
